data.name: Use_MPEG_VIDEO
data.value: Use MPEG video from the DVD version instead of lower resolution AVI

data.name: FailedToLoad
data.value: Failed to load saved game from file.

data.name: EngineDoesNotSupport
data.value: Engine does not support debug level '%s'

data.name: EnabledSubtitles
data.value: Subtitles are enabled, but subtitling in King's Quest 7 was unfinished and disabled in the release version of the game. ScummVM allows the subtitles to be re-enabled, but because they were removed from the original game, they do not always render properly or reflect the actual game speech. This is not a ScummVM bug -- it is a problem with the game's assets.
